title: Fostering sustainable agriculture: genotype-independent plant cell transfection mediated by piezoelectric nanomaterials via sonoporation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00031E, Paper
Anju Sangwan, Gurdeep Kaur, Pallavolu Maheswara Reddy, Neetu Singh
Coreâ€“shell barium titanate nanoparticles with silica (BTNPs@SiO2), amine-functionalized with APTES, followed by pDNA encapsulation, and assessed for transfection efficiency of pDNA conjugated BTNP@SiO2 in plant suspension cells via sonoporation.
